nlacp: A person may read any record for which he or she is the designated parent or guardian, and for which the patient is under 16 years of age.

truth.subject: person
truth.condition: the patient is under 16 years of age

truth.subject: person
truth.condition: person is the designated parent or guardian

pred.condition: person is the designated parent or guardian
